articles.author: Ethan Siegel
articles.title: JWST won’t find the very first stars, but a new telescope can - Big Think
articles.description: Many were hoping that JWST would find the first stars of all. Despite many hopeful claims, it hasn't, and probably can't. Here's how we can.

articles.title: An unknown bacteria on Earth has developed in the Chinese space station: astronauts are facing a situation straight out of a science fiction movie. - Farmingdale Observer
articles.description: An unknown bacterium, never before seen on our planet, has been discovered in the Chinese space station Tiangong. This discovery, worthy of science-fiction scenarios, raises new questions about life in orbit and microbiological risks. A different kind of spac…
